Copying from Android to Linux

android linux mtp cp
Published on 12 Jul 2020

On Ubuntu, Android MTP is mounted to a folder like this:

/run/user/1000/gvfs/mtp:host=\%5Busb\%3A001\%2C011\%5D/

There is a slight lag when you cd to there, and you can feel that youâ€™re on a remote filesystem, but copying large amounts of data from the phone is orders of magnitude faster on the command line.
